## TerrainTechnique interface

Technique used to render a terrain geometry with textures. For technique parameters see \[\[TerrainTechniqueParams\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface TerrainTechnique extends MakeTechniqueAttrs<TerrainTechniqueParams> 
```
